casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

June 6, 2011

[Cite as 06/06/2011 Case Announcements, 2011-Ohio-2692.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2007-1741. State v. Lang.

Stark C.P. No. 2006CR1824A. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Common Pleas of Stark County.

Upon consideration of appellant’s motion to strike incorrect statements in appellant’s reply brief, it is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.
